name: Ultimate Protector
description:
Players of Ultimate Protector need to protect a goddess statue from a large number of monsters which attempt to destroy it. At the meantime, in return of the protection, the goddess will offer “gift” which is able to upgrade the skill and weapon of the avatar.

There is no complicated control on this game, use WSAD to move and doge the monsters, all weapons are used automatically.
Sword
Thunder
Potion
…

Destroy the monsters and the experience gems will be collected by the goddess automatically and when it reaches a certain amount, the goddess will send out a “gift”, move close to it and upgrade the weapons.

There is 10 avatars to be selected, with different original weapon carried.
J. Torrance
Gregor
Shiranui
….

Meanwhile, there are 5 elements and to combine different element with weapons, super weapons will be created. Also, if you are lucky enough, some super weapons are able to combined again and generate HPYER weapons.

Choose your avatar, pick the ‘gifts” , upgrade the skills, discover super weapons and protect her!
